name: Loaded (itch) (upakai)
description:
Loaded is a retro-style 3D platforming game submitted to the GMTK 2022 game jam. It experiments with the idea of RNG in platforming. It is very frustrating and I hate it but It did get me thinking about risk vs reward in games. I hope this experimental design helps you think about it too.

If you have any questions, or want the code or assets, please comment on the itch.io page or email me at riordancallil@outlook.com
